---
id: CancelBatch订单
title: Cancel Batch 订单
sidebar_label: Cancel Batch 订单
sidebar_position: 6
---

**类型:** DELETE

**描述:** `/spot/v4/batch-order`

### 参数

| 名称 | 类型 | 必填 | 默认值值值值 | 描述 | 范围 |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| clientBatchId | 字符串 | 否 |  | Client batch id |  |
| orderIds | 数组 | 是 |  | 订单 ID list | `6216559590087220004, 6216559590087220005` |

### 注意事项

The parameters should be placed in the request 请求体 in the form of **JSON**.

### 响应示例

```json title="Response"
{
  "rc": 0,
  "mc": "字符串",
  "ma": [{}],
  "result": {}
}
```
